comments:

When I submitted this bug, a popup appeared and I realized that I hadn't entered my Bugzilla username/password (so I was trying to submit to the repository as anonymous).  I entered the info and then this bug submiited ok.  I then tried resubmitting attachment on bug 179146 and it works fine now, so I suspect this problem only occurs when there is an authentification problem.
Fixed as part of credentials/progress fixes to attachment wizard.  Meghan, please feel free to reopen if you see this again.
